body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear, Veement S80 4k+1080P Dual Dash Camera for Cars, WiFi Mini Car Camera,1.47” Display Dashcam,170°Wide, Night Vision,24H Parking Mode, G-Sensor,Loop Recording, Free 32G Card, App

features: 【Experience Road Journeys in Stunning Detail】 S80 dash cam is your all-in-one road companion, capturing every moment with simultaneous 4K(3840x2160P@30fps) UHD front and 1080p(1920x180P@30fps) rear recording. With 4K dash camera for cars wide-angle lens ensures you don't miss a thing, whether it's the beauty of the open road or unexpected road incidents.

【Day and Night Clarity and Safety】 Veement S80 4k dash camera front and rear is your trusty guardian on the road, offering super night vision technology and a wide F1.6 aperture for crystal-clear footage even in low-light conditions. Feel secure and prepared car dash cam during your night drives or unexpected weather changes.

【Effortless Connectivity and Sharing】 Stay connected and share your road adventures seamlessly with 4k dash cams Wi-Fi connection and user-friendly mobile app. Start using Veement 4k car camera, and share memorable moments with friends and family, from scenic road trips to humorous traffic encounters.

【Continuous Recording for Peace of Mind】 S80 dash cam for cars features seamless loop recording guarantees you never miss a moment. Dash camera 4k records and overwrites old footage, ensuring your latest journeys, events, and unexpected incidents are securely archived. Your road stories are protected.

【Enhanced Viewing on a 1.47-Inch IPS Display】 Veement S80 car dash cam enhances your viewing experience with its 1.47" HD IPS display. Review your recordings in clear and vibrant detail, adjust settings, and relive your adventures on the spot. Whether you're capturing stunning landscapes or documenting essential evidence with dash cam, S80 simplifies your dash cam experience.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Precision in Every Pixel, 4K Front, 1080P Rear – Record the Road in Brilliance

4K Front +1080P Rear 4K Front, 1080P Rear – Every Detail, Every Angle, Crystal Clear Veement S80 dash cam redefines your driving experience with a powerful dual-lens system. Capture every detail in 4K brilliance at the front and enjoy comprehensive coverage with the 1080P rear lens. Elevate your drive with clarity and safety – your essential companion on the road WiFi and App Seamless Connectivity, Effortless Control Stay connected on the road with Veement S80 dash camera built-in WiFi and VeeCar app. Whether you're streaming in real-time, adjusting settings, or downloading videos, the S80 ensures a seamless and user-friendly experience. Let it be your gateway to effortless control and connectivity, putting you in command of every drive. Starlight Night Vision + F1.8 large aperture Night Vision Mastery Experience unparalleled visibility with Veement S80 dash camera starlight night vision sensor and F1.8 large aperture. When the sun sets, S80 steps in as your night vision guardian, capturing clear and sharp footage even in low light conditions. Ensuring every nighttime drive is as secure as it is visually stunning. Voice Prompt Voice Prompts S80 Instant Status S80 dash provides instant insights through voice prompts. From startup to status updates, this dashcam keeps you informed without distraction. Ensuring you're always in the know without taking your eyes off the road. Drive with confidence and clarity with S80's intuitive voice guidance. Compact & Hidden Design Experience Power of Hidden Camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Dash Cam
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this dash cam is very impressive and it is extremely easy to use. Cam with hardware to install the camera and can be up and running within minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome dash cam!
reviews.reviewText: The Dash Camera was easy to install and set up the app on my phone. The camera views are sharp on my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, setup, use. Excellent product as expected the camera works incredible good, both front & rear camera

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy install, clear picture.
reviews.reviewText: Everything was super easy to do, even memory card formatting for my 64 gb card. Installed in a Jeep so wire tucking was ultra easy. Had a Rexing dashcam prior to this, and this cam is WAY better.
